mapper.insert: insert into tb_container_privilege values(null, (select id from tb_user where account=#{account}), #{cid}, #{privilege});
mapper.update: update tb_container_privilege set id=#{id}, uid=#{uid}, cid=#{cid}, privilege=#{privilege} where id=#{id};
mapper.delete: delete from tb_container_privilege where cid=#{cid} and uid=#{uid};
mapper.select: select tb_container_privilege.*, tb_user.account from tb_container_privilege, tb_user where tb_container_privilege.id=#{id} and tb_container_privilege.uid=tb_user.id;
select tb_container_privilege.*, tb_user.account from tb_container_privilege, tb_user where tb_container_privilege.cid=#{cid} and tb_container_privilege.uid=tb_user.id;
select 1 from tb_container_privilege where uid=#{uid} and cid=#{cid} and privilege=#{privilege};
